description: CLI Self-Management - Add update and uninstall commands to Contui

userStories.title: Add self-update functionality
userStories.description: As a user, I want to update Contui to the latest version directly from the CLI.
acceptanceCriteria: Check GitHub releases API for latest version
Compare current version with latest using semver
Download appropriate binary for current platform

userStories.title: Add update --check flag
userStories.description: As a user, I want to check if an update is available without installing it.
acceptanceCriteria: Show current version and latest version
Show 'Update available' or 'Up to date' message
Exit with appropriate code (0=up to date, 1=update available)

userStories.title: Add self-uninstall functionality
userStories.description: As a user, I want to uninstall Contui directly from the CLI.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove the binary from current_exe() path
Show success message with instructions for config cleanup

userStories.title: Add uninstall --purge flag
userStories.description: As a user, I want to remove Contui and all its configuration files.

userStories.title: Enhance version command
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see detailed version information.
acceptanceCriteria: Update help text with new commands
